repos.excerpt: Enhance your Netflix binge-watching with BingeFlix, a Chrome extension that lets you skip intros and seamlessly move to the next episode for uninterrupted viewing pleasure.
Explore a portfolio showcasing projects developed with React and Typescript, supported by a bespoke Python tool to manage project data and integrate with GitHub and OpenAI APIs.
Experience Discord Movienight with a Java bot using Javacord & Maven, managing movie lists and data from OMDB API. Integrate ChatGPT for engaging conversations and Adam Sandler-style interactions.
